name: Studio-Room-2-King-Beds---495sqf---46sqm-
description: This photo showcases our 495 square foot room, featuring two King size bed against the side wall with one night stand between the two beds. Across from the beds there is a seating arrangement which consists of two armchairs and a small table. In addition there is an armoire with dresser drawers and a 43 inch flat screen TV. Next to the armoire you will find a fully stocked mini bar, including wine, bottled beverages and assorted snacks available for purchase. The room also features a full size work desk, an Italian marble bathroom with a 55 gallon soaking tub and a vanity.
